item.title: Reproducible Builds
item.description: Reproducible builds, binaries and trust Carl Dong (Chaincode Labs) Introduction I am Carl and I work at Chaincode Labs and I will be talking about software, binaries and trust. I am happy that Ethan talked about his subject because it ties into my talk. For the purposes of this talk, assume that everything is perfect and there’s no bugs and no CVEs and all the things that Ethan talked about don’t exist.
